bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Robert Sampson was a mulatto man born about 1816. He was emancipated by Jacob Sampson through a deed dated April 7, 1857.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This accession includes a registration for Robert Sampson as a free Negro in Richmond, Virginia, 18 July 1857.
